system.description: When you navigate dangerous terrain or hostile environments, roll +Steel.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: The environment overwhelms you. You suffer harm, become lost, or face a serious setback.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: You make progress, but choose one: you take harm from the environment, you use up crucial supplies, or you take much longer than expected.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: You navigate the dangers successfully. You may also discover something useful or find a safer route.
